buffalo3d.core

Class RenderCaps

  • java.lang.Object
    • buffalo3d.core.RenderCaps

  • public class RenderCaps
extends Object
    Simple static class holding values representing various capabilities of hardware's concrete OpenGL capabilities that are relevant to buffalo3d's supported features.
